column1: Last Revised: 10/29/22  These features are not currently possible: operating cameras/spot light/ACC at any speed
** Below: ignore whatever you have where the x's are and just write the non-x value in the correct position **  Note: module BCM=BdyCM in FORScan

column7: Notes

column1: Auto Start/Stop Disable - by disabling BMS (Battery Management System)

column7: (optional - disables switch)
(optional - disables stop/start message center in the trip/fuel IPC menu)
position lamps at full brightness like Super Duty

column1: DRL - Parking Lights only (stock LEDs only)
column7:
** Testing DRLs: Make sure all of the following are set: **

1. Daytime Lights box checked in cluster under settings, adv settings, vehicle, lighting
2. Headlamp switch in the Auto position
3. Truck must be in gear for DRLs to work

column1: DRL - Parking Lights & Low Beams only

column7: ** On stock LEDs this will also illuminate outer halo
To enable DRL Parking Lights with these set 726-26-02: x1xx xxxx xxxx also
0=disabled, 8=enabled
** click here for tmcolegr's post on retrofitting non-folding to folding mirrors
** Tow mirrors require swapping pin 18 & 19 on mirror connector (see posts linked below) **
Tow Mirror mod instructions
B-ManFX4's comprehensive write-up w/pics on tow mirror mod here
regular autofold vs Lincoln autofold explained

column1: Autofold Mirrors - Lincoln Style (see desc in Notes)
column7: ** Tow mirrors require swapping pin 18 & 19 on mirror connector (see posts linked above) **
regular autofold vs Lincoln autofold explained
** Note: this only works for mirrors with memory **
Select left/right mirror, put truck in Reverse and mirror will automatically tilt down toward curb and then return to normal position when gear is changed.
Follow this link for the proper adjustment procedure for this mod
** For a 2018 740/741-13-01 may require FCxx **
After pressing lock/unlock on fob, press lock/unlock again and hold button for front windows to go up/down

column1: Disabling Canadian forced DRLs to cluster controlled
column7: DRL Cluster Control 1 enabled
Daytime Lights option & Lane Keeping System present in Settings
Daytime Lights option present & Lane Keeping System absent in Settings
If truck unlocked with fob, truck auto relocks after 45 seconds
Auto Relock Time Duration: 1=30 seconds, 2=45 seconds

column1: Allows NAV & ability to read text messages while vehicle in motion
column7: Sync2 - Sirius Travel Link no longer works
Sync3 - 911 assist will be disabled with this enabled. Speed limit sign will look European and FM radio stations will have and extra number like 102.70 instead of 102.7

column1:
Ability to do fogs & high beams at same time
aka "Bambi mode"
column7: Bambi mode without high beam/fogs remembered after ignition off/on
Bambi mode with high beam/fogs remembered after ignition off/on

column1: Driver & passenger seatbelt minder status off
Engine temp & Transmission temp shows above gauges (8" Clusters only)
column7: ** use this if you have trailer brake controller and turbos **

column1: IPC Quick Boot (No Ford animation shows on cluster)

column1: Powerpoint timeout enabled & set to 1 second

column2: If you have 0 for asterisk make it 2, if 4 make it 6, if 8 make A, if C make E, if 1 make it a 3
column7: ** also need this switch **
youtube video showing removing front cover to access switch
if your as-built is 0, use 2, if as-built is 1, use 3.  if as-built is D, use F.  If as-built is 5, use 7.  If as-built is 4, use 6
if your as-built is 0, use 8.  if your as-built is 6, use E

column1: Trailer Brake Controller Gain Setting enabled

column7: ** only for trucks that already have Active Park Assist **
if engine is running but fob is away from vehicle, vehicle cannot be put into any gear
Panic alarm on fob disabled
Panic alarm on fob requires 2 presses
Panic alarm on fob enabled
Panic alarm - lights & horn
Panic alarm - lights only

column1: Sync 3 New Blue Theme - GT Performance boot animation - doesn't work on Sync 3 v3.4
Variable Line Level Preamp Outputs From ACM (for adding aftermarket amp without sound clipping)
column7: See DanMc85's post here for a write-up on this
<--- this change required only if you have Sony DSP
Stereo Extended Play: A=off, 2=20mins, 3=30mins, 4=40mins, 5=50mins, 6=60mins (Sync 2 & Sync 3)
0=1 flash, 4=2 flashes, 6=3 flashes, 8=4 flashes, A=5 flashes, C=6 flashes, E=7 flashes  ** see SCCM spreadsheet for more options **
** when trailer is connected the truck will add 2 flashes to the above values **

Trailer Brake Controller Gain & TPMS Specified Value
0=TBC Gain disabled & TPMS Specified Value disabled 
4=TBC Gain enabled & TPMS Specified Value disabled 
8=TBC Gain disabled & TPMS Specified Value enabled 
C=TBC Gain enabled & TPMS Specified Value enabled
